title: Scimitars
content:
Scimitars in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Scimitars are Light, Finesse Martial Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Slashing Damage, though some special Scimitars also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Scimitars have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Scimitars in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Flourish and Lacerate.
